mapper.sql: orgid, vspid, topbranchid, name, code, status, feature, expireflag, expiretime, maxdevices, currentdevices, currentdeviceidx, maxdetail, maxstorage, currentstorage, copyright, description, backupvideoid, powerflag, poweron, poweroff, qrcodeflag, devicepassflag, devicepass, upgradeflag, volumeflag, volume, timezone, apps, logo, tags, defaultbundleid, defaultpageid, mainpage, city, boardtype, hightemperature, lowtemperature, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select:
select
from org where status='1' and code = #{code}
mapper.delete: update org set status='9' where orgid = #{orgid}
mapper.update: update org o, (select count(1) as value, orgid from device where status='1' group by orgid) r set o.currentdevices=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1

update org o, (select floor(coalesce(sum(size),0)/1048576) as value, orgid from (select size, videoid, orgid from video where status=1 union select size, imageid, orgid from image where status=1 ) source group by orgid) r set o.currentstorage=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into org (vspid, topbranchid, name, code, status, feature, expireflag, expiretime, maxdevices, currentdevices, currentdeviceidx, maxdetail, maxstorage, currentstorage, copyright, description, backupvideoid, powerflag, poweron, poweroff, qrcodeflag, devicepassflag, devicepass, upgradeflag, volumeflag, volume, timezone, apps, logo, tags, defaultbundleid, defaultpageid, mainpage, city, boardtype, hightemperature, lowtemperature, createtime, createstaffid) values (#{vspid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expireflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maxdevices,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentdevices,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentdeviceidx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxstorage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currentstorage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{copyright,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backupvideoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{powerflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{poweron,jdbcType=TIME}, #{poweroff,jdbcType=TIME}, #{qrcodeflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{devicepassflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{devicepass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upgradeflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{volumeflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timezone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultbundleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultpageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainpage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hightemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lowtemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
